citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process on 03-23-16.
The licensee was contacted by cell phone and stated they were out of town for the day and not available. Optimal
hours for inspection were discussed during this phone call. The licensee stated that cell phone is the best option to
contact the facility.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process on 03-23-16.  
The licensee was contacted by cell phone and stated they were out of town for the day and not available.  Optimal
hours for inspection were discussed during this phone call.   The licensee stated that cell phone is the best option to
contact the facility.
